name: Zetsubou Trip (Demo)
description:
Inspired in games like Corpse Party, Mad Father and The Witch's House. 

This Demo offers the preamble of an original story.

When a group of Highschoolers organize an Urban exploration to the abandoned district they will live a bizarre experience only known as  "Zetsubou Trip".

If by the end of the Demo you feel lost and you don't know what has happened in all the time you have played, but you feel intrigued and it makes you want to know what follows, then the objective will have been successfull.

WARNING: This Demo does NOT have a save system. The story lasts approximately 1 - 1:30 hours, please take that in mind before you start playing it.

I hope you enjoy it!

-J V
